TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit MessageQueueException extends System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException

summary.span: 發生 Microsoft Message Queuing 內部錯誤時，所擲回的例外狀況。

span.span: The exception that is thrown if a Microsoft Message Queuing internal error occurs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 例外狀況相關聯中訊息佇列，必須以處理透過您的程式碼的內部錯誤所產生類別。Exceptions associated with the class are generated by internal errors within Message Queuing that should be dealt with through your code. 每個例外狀況是由一個錯誤碼和描述錯誤來源的文字字串所組成。Every exception consists of an error code and a text string that describes the source of the error. 請參閱這些錯誤碼及其描述的類別清單。See the class for a list of these error codes and their descriptions. 如果 開啟一個佇列，而佇列中帶有設定為 true 的 `sharedModeDenyReceive` 參數，則後續嘗試從佇列讀取的任何 都會因為共用違規的緣故，產生 例外狀況。If a opens a queue with the `sharedModeDenyReceive` parameter set to true, any that subsequently tries to read from the queue generates a exception because of a sharing violation. 如果 在獨佔模式中嘗試存取該佇列，而另一個 已擁有該佇列的非獨佔存取，就會擲回相同的例外狀況。The same exception is thrown if a tries to access the queue in exclusive mode while another already has nonexclusive access to the queue. > **不支援警示標記!!!****alert tag is not supported!!!!** > 能夠辨識執行緒的 Apartment。 is threading-apartment–aware. Visual Basic 會將主執行緒的狀態`STA`，因此您必須先套用中`Main`副程式。Visual Basic sets the state of the main thread to `STA`, so you must apply the in the `Main` subroutine. 否則，使用其他執行緒傳送交易式訊息時，會擲回 例外狀況。Otherwise, sending a transactional message using another thread throws a exception. ## Examples [!code-cpp[MessageQueue.ExistsDelete#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.ExistsDelete/CPP/mqexistsdelete.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[MessageQueue.ExistsDelete#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.ExistsDelete/CS/mqexistsdelete.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MessageQueue.ExistsDelete#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/MessageQueue.ExistsDelete/VB/mqexistsdelete.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property Message As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Message { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得一個描述訊息佇列錯誤的值。

span.span: Gets a value that describes the Message Queuing error.

value.span: 產生這個 訊息佇列內部錯誤的描述。

span.span: The description of the Message Queuing internal error that generated this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您取得這個屬性時，該方法會嘗試擷取與相關聯的文字字串屬性。When you get this property, the method attempts to retrieve the text string associated with the property. 如果方法無法解譯訊息佇列產生的錯誤碼屬性取得的值`UnknownError`。If the method is unable to interpret the error code that Message Queuing generated, the property gets the value `UnknownError`.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property MessageQueueErrorCode As MessageQueueErrorCode
public: property System::Messaging::MessageQueueErrorCode MessageQueueErrorCode { System::Messaging::MessageQueueErrorCode get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，指出與這個例外狀況關聯的錯誤碼。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates the error code associated with this exception.

value.span: 將辨認訊息佇列產生的錯誤類型。

span.span: A that identifies the type of error Message Queuing generated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含與此相關聯的字串更完整描述錯誤的來源。The property contains a string associated with this that more fully describes the source of the error.
